    • findByUserAndBadge

      AwardedBadge findByUserAndBadge(int userId, int badgeId)
      Finds a badge with a given id that was awarded to a user with a given id.
      Parameters:
      userId - - the id of the user that was awarded
      badgeId - - the id of the badge that was awarded

    • getAllForUser

      Iterable<AwardedBadge> getAllForUser(int userId)
      Gets all the badges that were awarded to a user.
      Parameters:
      userId - - the id of the user
      Returns:
      iterable object containing AwardedBadge objects which refer the user with the given id
